text: Daria's deep understanding of software design and clean modular code were instructive examples that continue to inform how I approach development work, and which set the standard for our team.
In technical discussions, Daria has a stunning ability to express her point of view respectfully and move the team towards a solution in a productive manner.
Daria quickly established herself as the technical mentor for her team. She digs deep into code to understand completely what is happening under the hood, and continually impressed us with her skill.

Daria's diverse experience makes her an invaluable asset as a client-facing engineer capable of balancing sales, presentation skills and the ability to explain technical concepts in an accessible way.

Daria has a profound understanding of the project, tools, and code, providing precise advice whenever I sought guidance from her. She consistently endeavours to organize and enhance the team's development experience, fostering collective growth.
Daria possesses crucial skills for a small company employee: the ability to self-manage and to continue making an impact while keeping track of changing priorities.

While Daria's skills as a developer and ability to quickly pick up technical skills are clearly amazing, it's her ability to critically assess problems and present them in a succinct manner that sets her apart.
One of Daria's strengths is being self-aware enough to accept feedback without ego and put the team's needs first by being fair and humble.
